description: Lists available reserved DB instance offerings.

parameters.name: ReservedDBInstancesOfferingId
parameters.description: The offering identifier filter value. Specify this parameter to show only the available offering that matches the specified reservation identifier. Example: 438012d3-4052-4cc7-b2e3-8d3372e0e706

parameters.name: Duration
parameters.description: Duration filter value, specified in years or seconds. Specify this parameter to show only reservations for this duration. Valid Values: 1 | 3 | 31536000 | 94608000

parameters.name: ProductDescription
parameters.description: Product description filter value. Specify this parameter to show only the available offerings that contain the specified product description.

parameters.name: OfferingType
parameters.description: The offering type filter value. Specify this parameter to show only the available offerings matching the specified offering type. Valid Values: "Partial Upfront" | "All Upfront" | "No Upfront"

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: This parameter isn't currently supported. (dict) --- A filter name and value pair that is used to return a more specific list of results from a describe operation. Filters can be used to match a set of resources by specific criteria, such as IDs. The filters supported by a describe operation are documented with the describe operation. The following actions can be filtered: DescribeDBClusterBacktracks DescribeDBClusterEndpoints DescribeDBClusters DescribeDBInstances DescribeDBRecommendations DescribeDBShardGroups DescribePendingMaintenanceActions The name of the filter. Filter names are case-sensitive. One or more filter values. Filter values are case-sensitive. (string) ---

parameters.name: MaxRecords
parameters.description: The maximum number of records to include in the response. If more than the MaxRecords value is available, a pagination token called a marker is included in the response so you can retrieve the remaining results. Default: 100 Constraints: Minimum 20, maximum 100.

nested_items.name: Marker
nested_items.description: An optional pagination token provided by a previous request. If this parameter is specified, the response includes only records beyond the marker, up to the value specified by MaxRecords.

nested_items.name: ReservedDBInstancesOfferings
nested_items.description: A list of reserved DB instance offerings.

nested_items.name: DBInstanceClass
nested_items.description: The DB instance class for the reserved DB instance.

nested_items.name: Duration
nested_items.description: The duration of the offering in seconds.

nested_items.name: FixedPrice
nested_items.description: The fixed price charged for this offering.

nested_items.name: UsagePrice
nested_items.description: The hourly price charged for this offering.

nested_items.name: CurrencyCode
nested_items.description: The currency code for the reserved DB instance offering.

nested_items.name: ProductDescription
nested_items.description: The database engine used by the offering.

nested_items.name: MultiAZ
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the offering applies to Multi-AZ deployments.

nested_items.name: RecurringCharges
nested_items.description: The recurring price charged to run this reserved DB instance.

nested_items.name: RecurringChargeAmount
nested_items.description: The amount of the recurring charge.

nested_items.name: RecurringChargeFrequency
nested_items.description: The frequency of the recurring charge.
